mapper.select: SELECT sum(bc.payment_amount) as COUNT, TO_CHAR(bc.charge_date, 'YYYYMM') as YEARDATA FROM bamboo_charge bc WHERE bc.charge_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') and bc.charge_date < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(bc.charge_date, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY YEARDATA

SELECT (sum(ex.total) - sum(ex.payment_amount)) as EX_COUNT, TO_CHAR(ex.approve_date, 'YYYYMM') as EXDATA FROM exchange ex WHERE ex.approve_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') and ex.approve_date < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ex.approve_date, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY EXDATA
